item.title: bidi - l10n utilities
item.description: The bidi mixins are used to declare both the LTR and RTL values for a property together and output appropriate declarations. This makes it easier to maintain the RTL version since you only have to update values in one place. accepts: a list of lists - each list must have 3 or 4 values A list with three properties overrides the ltr value in rtl locales @include bidi(((float, left, right),)); Results in:
